SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.mostc.model.phpt
Class PhpBuild

java.lang.Object
  com.mostc.model.Build
      com.mostc.model.phpt.PhpBuild

public class PhpBuild
extends Build

represents a single build of PHP. To be clear, NTS and TS builds that were built together, even from the same configuration and source, are still considered two separate builds.

isExtensionEnabled

public boolean isExtensionEnabled(Host host,
                                  PhpIni ini,
                                  java.lang.String ext_name)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
checks to see if the extension is enabled or statically builtin to this build Note that PhpIni#hasExtension only checks to see if the extension is enabled in a PhpIni whereas #isExtensionEnabled checks to see if its enabled. PhpIni#hasExtension will miss builtin/static extensions.

Parameters:
host -
ini -
ext_name -
Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
